oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. Finis Garrett letter, Jan. 5, 1915 02
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Finis Garrett, U.S. House of Representatives, Committee on Rules, Washington, D.C., to Mrs. Crozier French, President, Tennessee Equal Suffrage Association, Knoxville, Tenn. January 5, 1915. Page 2 of 3. Re: his position on suffrage.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Politicians; Women's suffrage;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Finis Garrett
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
